channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann and Madam Ambassador Chiara Porro speak about the International Religious Freedom or Belief Alliance, which works to advance freedom of religion or belief worldwide. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Giorgio A Modern Day Miracle Story
channel.desc: The family of a comatose young adult finds the miracle they?ve been praying for after beseeching for Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati?s heavenly intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Thomas and his wife Helen teach their children Alex and Sarah about the heroic life of Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati, the patron of youth. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: To The Top Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: Filmed in Italy, this docudrama chronicles the life and spirituality of Pier Giorgio Frassati, an Italian activist who put his Catholic beliefs into practice to help the poor and downtrodden in his hometown of Turin. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Into The Breach: The Mission Of The Family
channel.desc: In a world that doesn?t value Christian ideals, how can we raise spiritually strong children? Discover what can instill an authentic desire in our children to deepen their Faith. (15 minutes).
